column2: "Na kusuwwyɛ no ronnko hɔ mma nyia ɔwɔ ahoguan mu no. Mber a odzi kan no
column3: oemmbu Zebulun asaase na Naftali asaase bi
column4: na ekyirii dze ɔahyɛ no enyimnyam
hɔn a wɔtsenaa owu sunsuma asaase do no

column3: ɔwo ama hɔn enyigye adɔɔ so: hɔn enyi gye w'enyim dɛ otwaber mu enyigye
column4: dɛ mbrɛ adasa dzi ehurusi ber a wɔrekyɛ asadze."

column5: ɔwo ebubu mu dɛ Media da no."

column2: "Na ɔkofo n'akodze a ɔwɔ gyigyeegye no mu nyina
column3: na ntar a wɔdze efuntamfuntam bɔgya mu
wɔama hɛn ɔbabanyin; na ahendzi no bɛda ne batsir do: na wɔbɛfrɛ ne dzin Ɔpamfo Nwanwanyi

column2: "Na n'ahendzi na n'asomdwee ne trɛ nnkodu ewiei
column3: wɔ David ahengua do na n'ahendzi do
column5: na ɔdze atsɛmbu na tsenenee awowaw no ofitsi ndɛ dze ekesi mbersantsen. Dɔm EWURADZE no mbɔdzembɔ bɛyɛ yi."

column3: Efraim na Samariafo a wɔka wɔ nkontompɔ na hɔn akokodur mu dɛ
column6: na yɛdze abo a wɔasen besi: wɔatotow ankye ndua

column2: "Dɛm ntsi EWURADZE bɛma Rezin ahohiahiafo do ahyɛ no do

column4: wɔdze anomu petoo bɛmen Israel. Iyi nyinara mu n'ebufuw nntɔree
column5: na ne nsa da ho ara tsen."

column2: "Naaso ɔman no nnsanee mmbaa nyia ɔbɔɔ hɔn no nkyɛn
column3: eso wɔnnhwehwɛɛ dɔm EWURADZE n'ekyir kwan."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi EWURADZE botwa efi Israel mu da kor tsir na dua
"Hɔn a wodzi ɔman yi enyim no ma wɔfom; na hɔn akwankyerɛ no sɛɛ hɔn."

column3: EWURADZE rinnya hɔn mberantsɛ ho enyigye
column4: eso onnyi ehumbɔbɔr ma hɔn ngyanka nye hɔn ekunafo: na obiara tsia Nyankopɔn
column5: na ɔyɛ emumuyɛdze na ano biara ka nkwaseasɛm. Iyi nyina mu n'ebufuw nntɔree
column6: na ne nsa da ho ara wɔ sor."

column2: "Na emumuyɛ hyew dɛ ogya; ɔmen nkɔkrɔw ɔnye nsoɛ: ampaara
column3: ɔsɔ wɔ kwaa mu adɔtɔ mu
column4: na opun wusiw kumbɔɔ fow kɔ sor."

column2: "Dɔm EWURADZE n'ebufuw do na asaase no ahyew tumm no: na ɔman no so ayɛ dɛ ogya nyena; obiara mmfa no nua ho nkyɛ no."

column3: naaso ɔkɔm dze hɔn; Wodzidzi wɔ bankum
column4: naaso wɔmmee: na wɔwewe hɔnara hɔn nsa ho nam."

column3: na Efraim we Manaasɛ: na hɔn beenu soɛr hyɛ Juda do. Iyi nyina mu n'ebufuw nntɔree na ne nsa da ho ara wɔ sor."
